column5: Every year, my sister invite us over to her cottage for the weekend and every year I look forward to being there   This past weekend was the time my family and I get to spend quality time up there for the last few days of our vacation  The cottage is situated on an island and surrounded by water... only way to get there is by boat    Tranquility and peace is what I look forward to when going up  No hydro, phone, TV, computer to play with but there's lots more things to do for the whole family like going on the beach and sit in the sun with a cold drink  and when it's too hot, hit the lake  Water skying, fishing, hiking in the bush or going for a boat ride are all great activities to do  Here's a view of the beach    and a few more             Here's a few shots of the cottage and the landscape                 Inside views             There's also water skying for those that like it... sister here getting ready       Brother in law getting ready to go         My daughter Mélissa tried water skying for the first time and compiled a video of her attemps... she almost got it  <embed width="600" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowFullscreen="true" allowNetworking="all" wmode="transparent" src="http://static.photobucket.com/player.swf" flashvars="file=http%3A%2F%2Fvid732.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Fww321%2Fleechman1%2FSoftwater%2520Season%25202012%2FCamp%2520Danielle%2520et%2520Phil%2520-%252028%2520Juillet%25202012%2FFamily%2520Getaway%25202012%2FMlissaWaterSkyingAttemps.mp4">     There's also fishing to do for those that like it             Here I was anxiously watching my daughter take on water skying for the first time       Miscellaneous shots           last but not least... the residents            All in all my family and I had a great time    but this morning, reality hit hard... it was back to work Ah well, there's always next year  Hope you enjoy! Tight lines TJunkie
DUDE.  That's your daughter?!?!  Nice one budday.  cheers HD
Looks like a beautiful spot to get away from it all, Jacques!  Love the squirrel shots.
Great report, Jacques. Traditions are a part of what keeps families together.
awesome report! Very jealous - Thanks for hte report!
Now that looked like a fun time... cool place...

That place looks stunning....its like a little tropical lagoon!  Holy moly Jacques, your daughter is a beautiful young woman! Amazing how fast they grow up.  That scarecrow thing is gonna give me nightmares.  And I think the word for the cottage is bijou, n'est pas?   Great report  Great pics.
Beautiful place! That beach looks like Gulligan's Island!!
The bay where the cottage rests is just magnificient....so much privacy.  Sounds like one heck of a weekend. Cheers!
Sounds like a great weekend Jacques. Thanks for sharing.
THANKS FOR SHARING!!!  Looks so peaceful and relaxing - something a lot of us need (...or at least I know I do)
That looks like a great place to get away from it all. Great report Jacques.
Awesome report Jacques !!!! Great place to unwind.

Thanks everyone for the kind words!!!  Glad you enjoy it!!!   Yep   My sweet precious little girl   Sure is Simon!!! Your telling me.... Mélissa is going to be 17 this fall    One more year in High school and then she graduates   times sure flies by fast  Brother in law calls the scarecrow "The Beach Keeper"... he protects the flower beds behind it from a doe and her 2 fawns from eating them... They always come out during the night and in the morning, see their tracks on the beach  Your right, bijou is the right word for this place
